name: 免疫學
description: This course will enable the student to gain a broad foundation base and build upon that base for understanding the defense mechanisms of the human body. These topics will include innate and adaptive immunity, antigen capture and recognition, mechanisms of immune reactions, immunological tolerance, immunological diseases, vaccine and immunological assays.
goals: Demonstrate a comprehensive and practical understanding of basic immunological principles involved in research and clinical/applied science.
Discuss current immunology news and issues
syllabus:
第一週 課程介紹

第二週 Basic Concepts in Immunology

第三週 Innate Immunity and inflammation

第四週 Antigen Recognition by B-cell and T-cell Receptors

第五週 Antigen Presentation to T Lymphocytes

第六週 Lymphocyte Receptor Signaling

第七週 The Development and of B and T Lymphocytes

第八週 T Cell-Mediated Immunity

第九週 期中考

第十週 The Humoral Immune Response

第十一週 Integrated Dynamics of Innate and Adaptive Immunity

第十二週 The Mucosal Immune System

第十三週 Failures of Host Defense Mechanisms

第十四週 Allergy and Allergic Diseases

第十五週 Autoimmunity and Transplantation

第十六週  Manipulation of the Immune Response

第十七週 Cancer immunity

第十八週 期末考
